summary: Spins the tale of a woman, her sister, and the man who completes the triangle. Told through such fertile sources as grand opera, classical painting, and Victorian melodrama.
cast: Randy Danson|Marilyn Jones|Kevin Wade|Grant Stewart|Arthur Ginsberg|Milton Ginsberg|Eric Mitchell|Marion Greenstone|Claudia Weill|Bill Karnovsky|Judith Sobol|Margot Breier|Joe Keller
title: The Scenic Route
